description: Mobile techniques used by FlyTrap, ATT&CK software S1093 (v1.0)
name: FlyTrap (S1093)

techniques.comment: [FlyTrap](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1093) can use HTTP to communicate with the C2 server.(Citation: Zimperium FlyTrap)
[FlyTrap](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1093) can use HTTP to exfiltrate data to the C2 server.(Citation: Zimperium FlyTrap)
[FlyTrap](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1093) has used infected applications with Facebook login prompts to steal credentials.(Citation: Trend Micro FlyTrap)
[FlyTrap](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1093) can collect device geolocation data.(Citation: Trend Micro FlyTrap)

[FlyTrap](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1093) can collect Facebook account information, such as Facebook ID, email address, cookies, and login tokens.(Citation: Trend Micro FlyTrap)(Citation: Zimperium FlyTrap)
[FlyTrap](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1093) can collect IP address and network configuration information.(Citation: Trend Micro FlyTrap)
[FlyTrap](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1093) can collect IP address and network configuration information.(Citation: Trend Micro FlyTrap)
